name: Listerine Cool Mint Liquid Mouthwash
description:
Did you know? Brushing cleans only 25% of your mouth. Germs left behind in your mouth may cause bad breath, plaque and gum problems. Listerine Original Mouthwash reaches all parts of your mouth and removes 99.9% germs to help prevent gum problem, bad breath, & plaque.• Unique formula with 4 Essential Oils deeply penetrates to remove the bacteria in the plaque biofilm  • Listerine helps reduce gum problems in 2 weeks How to use:  • Rinse with undiluted (do not mix it with water) 20ml twice a day for 30 seconds. • Don't rinse mouth with water or eat and drink anything for 30 minutes’ post rinse. Precaution: For external use only. Not to be swallowed. Keep out of reach of children. Not recommended for children below 12 years of age. If you accidentally swallow quantity more than used for rinsing, get medical help.

name: ProDentalB Dental Stain Remover
description:
Stain removing tip made of hardened rubber with grit finish. It removes hard-to-remove teeth stains (from smoking, tea, alcohol, sugar, etc.) without damaging teeth enamel. It is made with Food-grade virgin plastic and is easy to use.
Stain removing tip made of hardened rubber with grit finish. It removes hard-to-remove teeth stains (from smoking, tea, alcohol, sugar, etc.) without damaging teeth enamel. It is made with Food-grade virgin plastic and is easy to use.

name: Pepsodent Tooth Powder
description:
It fights germs & protects teeth from decay. For strong teeth & freshness, use Pepsodent Toothpowder.

name: ProDentalB Cool Mint Mouthwash
description:
Alcohol-free, Halal certified. It has Spearmint & 100% tural tea tree oil, an anti-bacterial agent that helps to kill germs. No alcohol makes it safe for pregnant women and kids and also reduces the risk of cancer and xerostomia.

name: Trisa Dental Floss Easy Waxed 40 m
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Switzerland and its raw materials are collected from Switzerland. Trisa Dental Floss Easy Waxed is a dental hygiene essential designed to help you maintain clean and healthy teeth and gums. This 40-meter spool of dental floss is thoughtfully crafted to provide an efficient and easy-to-use solution for removing food particles and plaque from between your teeth, promoting oral hygiene and preventing dental issues.
This product is manufactured/packaged in Switzerland and its raw materials are collected from Switzerland.

name: Listerine Cavity Fighter Liquid Mouthwash
description:
Did you know? Brushing cleans only 25% of your mouth. Germs left behind in your mouth may cause bad breath, plaque and gum problems. Listerine Cavity Fighter Mouthwash reaches all parts of your mouth and removes 99.9% germs to help prevent gum problem, bad breath, & plaque. • Brushing can miss a billion germs, which may lead to various oral problems  • Listerine reaches all parts of your mouth, removes 99.9% germs and helps strengthen teeth and prevent cavities  • The power of 4 essential oils combined with sodium fluoride in Listerine Cavity Fighter mouthwash helps strengthen teeth and prevent cavities  • Ideal for those who have orthodontic attachments, helps to clean the areas in the mouth which brushing misses  • For best results, rinse with undiluted 20ml Listerine twice a day for 30 seconds. Don't rinse mouth with water or eat and drink anything for 30 minutes’ post rinse. • Suitable for ages 12 and above  How to use:  • Rinse with undiluted (do not mix it with water) 20ml twice a day for 30 seconds.  • Don't rinse mouth with water or eat and drink anything for 30 minutes’ post rinse. name: Sensodyne Fresh Gel
description:
Introducing Sensodyne Fresh Gel Toothpaste in a 40 gm tube, an advanced oral care solution designed to provide effective relief from tooth sensitivity while offering a refreshing and invigorating oral experience. This toothpaste combines sensitivity relief with a burst of freshness, ensuring a pleasant and revitalizing daily dental routine. Experience the benefits of Sensodyne Fresh Gel Toothpaste. Tailored for individuals with sensitive teeth, this toothpaste not only addresses sensitivity but also offers a revitalizing gel formula that leaves your mouth feeling fresh and clean. It works by forming a protective barrier over exposed dentin, providing relief from sensitivity triggers while delivering a burst of cooling freshness.

name: Magic Tooth Powder
description:
Magic Tooth Powder comes in easy flip top container. it has a spicy mint flavor, which gives the mouth a sharp, fresh feel while calcium helps to strengthen teeth. Magic comes with a promise to give every person the freedom to speak up and the days of bad breath will be forgotten effortlessly.

name: Colgate Plax Gentle Care Mouth Wash
description:
Colgate Plax Gentle Care mouthwash removes over 99% of germs that cause bad breath and cavities, giving you a fresher and cleaner mouth than brushing alone. It has a unique formula that provides gentle care for sensitive teeth and gums.

name: Toothpick
description:
A small pointed piece of wood, plastic, etc., for removing substances, especially food particles, from between the teeth.
A small pointed piece of wood, plastic, etc., for removing substances, especially food particles, from between the teeth.

name: Toothpick Local 1 box
description:
A toothpick is a small thin stick of wood, plastic, bamboo, metal, bone or other substance with at least one and sometimes two pointed ends to insert between teeth to remove detritus, usually after a meal.
A toothpick is a small thin stick of wood, plastic, bamboo, metal, bone or other substance with at least one and sometimes two pointed ends to insert between teeth to remove detritus, usually after a meal.

name: Magic Tooth Powder
description:
Magic Tooth Powder comes in an easy flip-top container. it has a spicy mint flavor, which gives the mouth a sharp, fresh feel while calcium helps to strengthen teeth. Magic comes with a promise to give every person the freedom to speak up and the days of bad breath will be forgotten effortlessly. Ingredients: Calcium carbonate, Dicalcium phosphate anhydrous, Sodium saccharin, Sodium lauryl sulfate, Silica, Sodium chloride, Triclosan, Menthol, Clove mint flavor.

name: Watson Dental Floss Picks Charcoal
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in China and its raw materials are collected from China. Watson Dental Floss Picks Charcoal are advanced oral care tools designed to enhance your dental hygiene routine. This pack contains 50 dental floss picks, each carefully engineered to provide effective plaque and debris removal while harnessing the benefits of activated charcoal for a refreshed and clean feeling in your mouth.

name: ProDentalB Tongue Cleaner
description:
It helps to remove the odor and disease-causing plaque, bacteria, and food debris from the tongue's surface. It avoids harming your taste buds or breaking the tongue skin. BPA, PVC free & food grade vergin' plastic.

name: ProDentalB Orange Breath Spray Mouth Freshener
description:

name: ProDentalB Tooth Floss Pick
description:
Contains Teflon fiber with natural wax coating so easily glides between your teeth. It helps to keep your teeth and gums healthy by effectively removing dental plaque and particles between teeth which is unreachable by ordinary toothbrushes.
